name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: 400g spaghetti, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 onion (finely chopped), 2 garlic cloves (minced), 500g ground beef, 400g canned tomatoes, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, Salt and pepper to taste, Parmesan cheese (grated for garnish)
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until softened.
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned.
4. Stir in canned tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer for about 20 minutes until the sauce thickens.
5. Serve the sauce over spaghetti and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: 500g chicken breast (diced), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 onion (finely chopped), 2 garlic cloves (minced), 1 tablespoon ginger paste, 2 tablespoons curry powder, 400ml coconut milk, Salt to taste, Fresh cilantro for garnish
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger paste; sauté until fragrant.
2. Add chicken pieces and cook until lightly browned.
3. Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.
4. Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. Cook for about 20 minutes or until the chicken is tender and the sauce thickens.
5. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with steamed rice or naan.

name: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Fresh mozzarella cheese (sliced into rounds), Ripe tomatoes (sliced into rounds), Fresh basil leaves, Olive oil (for drizzling), Balsamic glaze (optional)
instructions: 1. Arrange alternating slices of mozzarella cheese and tomatoes on a serving plate.
2. Tuck fresh basil leaves between each slice for added flavor and presentation.
3. Drizzle olive oil over the salad and add balsamic glaze if desired for extra tanginess.
4. Serve immediately as a starter or light meal.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
ingredients: 500g beef sirloin, thinly sliced, 1 red bell pepper, slicked,1 green bell pepper, sliced, 1 onion, sliced, 2 cloves of garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons oyester sauce, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, Salt and pepper to taste.
instructions: 1. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, salt, and pepper.
2. Heat oil in wok or large skillet over high heat.
3. Add beef slices and stir-fry until browned; remove from wok and set aside.
4. In the same wok, add garlic, bell peppers, and onion; stir-fry until vegetables are crisp-tender.
5. Return beef to the wok and pour in the sauce mixture; stir-fry for a minute until the sauce thickens and coats the ingredients. Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.
